line_2: From childhood's dawn still welcomed yearly.
To see me thro' the barley.

line_1: And cheerful pastime, late and early,
line_2: And parents kind who love us dearly; —

line_1: Ere his glad voice proclaimed thy dawning early,
line_2: Through the damp grass hoarse accents sounded cheerly,

line_1: While a' our guid neighbours are stirring sae early:
line_2: O, gin my wife wad wurk timely and fairly!

line_1: While a' our guid neighbours are stirring sae early:
line_2: Timely and fairly, timely and fairly,

line_1: While a' our guid neighbours are stirring sae early:
line_2: O, gin my wife wad wurk timely and fairly!
